TEST ca-app-pub-3940256099942544/6300978111 Hello world! Settings FAQ About
How to Use: Bar Colors
Bars are used to denote the possibility of occurance. If the bar is Green, it beats the probability of the opposing roll. If it is red, it loses in probability. Left and Right Columns Left column denotes probability of getting EXACTLY listed amount of successes. Right column denotes probability of getting AT LEAST listed amount of successes. Right column is more useful in standard play. Best uses for Left column include, but are not limited to: C-3P0.
Bar Heights Longer bars denote a higher probability of occurance.
Modifiers Checking the modifiers (Focus, Target Lock) will modify probabilities accordingly. Either, both or none can be checked at once.
